title: Adani Power has $800 million in unpaid dues from Bangladesh
description: Adani Power: Bangladesh owes $800 million to Adani Power Ltd. for electricity from its coal-fired plant in Jharkhand. Unpaid dues could disrupt electricity supply. The interim government is negotiating with Adani to resolve this and seeking additional IMF loans to manage economic challenges. Adani's international expansion carries significant financial and geopolitical risks.
